docs.text: A simple paradox plugin, which will draw diagrams from formal definitions.
docs.title: sbt-paradox-diagrams

docs.text:
Sequence Diagrams (via https://bramp.github.io/js-sequence-diagrams) FlowCharts (via http://flowchart.js.org) Gantt and others (via https://mermaidjs.github.io)
For more information on supported diagrams, visit the listed sites.
docs.title: Supported Diagram Types

docs.text:
Add the following lines to your project/plugins.sbt:
addSbtPlugin("com.wanari" % "sbt-paradox-diagrams" % "0.1.3")
docs.title: Setup

docs.text:
is created via
@@@ sequence-diagram
```raw
Andrew->China: Says Hello
Note right of China: China thinks about it
China-->Andrew: How are you?
Andrew->>China: I am good thanks!
```
@@@
docs.title: Sequence Diagram

docs.text:
is created via
@@@ flowchart-diagram
```raw
st=>start: Start:>http://www.google.com[blank]
e=>end:>http://www.google.com
op1=>operation: My Operation
sub1=>subroutine: My Subroutine
cond=>condition: Yes
or No?:>http://www.google.com
io=>inputoutput: catch something...
para=>parallel: parallel tasks

st->op1->cond
cond(yes)->io->e
cond(no)->para
para(path1, bottom)->sub1(right)->op1
para(path2, top)->op1
```
@@@
docs.title: Flow Chart Diagram

docs.text:
graph LR A --- B B-->C[fa:fa-ban forbidden] B-->D(fa:fa-spinner ok);
is created via
@@@ mermaid-diagram
```raw
graph LR
  A --- B
  B-->C[fa:fa-ban forbidden]
  B-->D(fa:fa-spinner ok);
```
@@@
docs.title: Mermaid Diagram

docs.text: release on maven central add dot and railroad, idea from: https://github.com/francoislaberge/diagrams
